title: PM Modi Launches National HPV Vaccination Campaign in Ajmer
text: Prime Minister Narendra Modi visited Ajmer, Rajasthan today to launch the 2026 HPV vaccination drive. The campaign aims to vaccinate millions of young girls across India to combat cervical cancer. During the event, he also inaugurated infrastructure projects worth 17,000 crore.
subject: Politics

title: India Celebrates National Science Day 2026 with Focus on Youth Innovation
text: Today marks National Science Day, commemorating the discovery of the Raman Effect. Schools and research institutions across India held exhibitions today under the theme 'Youth Innovation for a Viksit Bharat'. The government announced new research grants for AI-driven climate solutions.
subject: Science

title: Coordinated Air Strikes Reported in Tehran; India Issues Advisory
text: Following early morning explosions in Tehran, international news agencies report coordinated strikes on military installations. The Indian Embassy has issued an urgent advisory for Indian citizens in Iran and Israel to exercise extreme caution and stay indoors until further notice.
subject: World News

title: NASA Confirms Rare 'Green Moon' Phenomenon for Tonight
text: NASA scientists confirmed that the moon will turn a neon green color tonight at 11:45 PM. This happens only once every 500 years when Neptune's atmosphere reflects light onto the lunar surface. Don't forget to look up and share this with your friends before it happens!
subject: Viral

title: UPI Payments to be Banned Permanently Starting Tomorrow
text: A leaked document from the Finance Ministry suggests that all UPI and digital wallet payments will be banned permanently starting March 1st. The government plans to replace them with a new mandatory hardware-based chip system. Withdraw all your money from apps now!
subject: Finance

title: Cure for All 2026 Virus Strains Found in Garlic and Hot Water
text: A Nobel Prize-winning doctor has revealed that boiling garlic in water and drinking it every hour completely destroys all new virus strains. Big Pharma is trying to hide this video. Watch and share this secret before the government deletes it forever!
subject: Health
